experience.title: Graduate Research Assistant
experience.organization: University of Washington, Paul G. Allen School of Computer Science & Engineering
experience.description: Collaborated on research focusing on distributed systems scalability; developed a prototype in Go to simulate high-throughput network communication protocols and analyzed performance bottlenecks.

experience.title: Software Research Intern
experience.description: Researched and implemented automated software testing strategies for large-scale scientific simulations; utilized Python and Docker to containerize research environments and improve reproducibility of results.

experience.title: Independent Researcher
experience.description: Conducted a comparative analysis of memory management techniques in Rust vs C++; published findings in a peer-reviewed undergraduate journal and contributed performance patches to a popular open-source data parser.

metadata.experience_level: Relevant research done for the job field.
